wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[1 January|1]]''' - Fantasy novel ''[[The Search for the Red Dragon]]'', featuring [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] as a fictional character, is published.
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Birthday Dinner.
* '''[[5 January|5]]''' - [http://entertainment.timesonline.co.uk/tol/arts_and_entertainment/books/article3127837.ece The Times] ranks [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] the sixth-best post-war British writer. 
* '''[[14 January|14]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Ultimate Critical Review]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 209]]'' is published.

==February==
* '''[[6 February|6]]''' - Artist [[John Alvin]] dies.
* '''[[7 February|7]]-[[9 February|9]]''' - ''[[C.S. Lewis]], the [[Inklings]], and the Call to Christian Community'' conference, featuring [[Tom Shippey]].
* '''[[11 February|11]]''' - The [[Tolkien Estate]], [[The Tolkien Trust]] and [[HarperCollins]] file a lawsuit against [[New Line Cinema]] and the [[Saul Zaentz Company]].
* '''[[13 February|13]]''' - The twelfth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "The Ashen Wastes", is released in North America.
* '''[[14 February|14]]''' - The twelfth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "The Ashen Wastes", is released in Europe.
* '''[[15 February|15]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings and the Western Narrative Tradition]]'' is published

==March==
* '''[[4 March|4]]''' - Composer [[Leonard Rosenman]] dies.
* '''[[9 March|9]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Shorter Works]]'' is published.
* '''[[10 March|10]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is elected as the "Best Foreign Book of All Time" in the Netherlands. 
* '''[[11 March|11]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings – Sources of Inspiration]]'' is published.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''[[31 March|31]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Gedling]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 210]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 45|''Mallorn'' 45]] is published.

==April==
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - [[Guillermo del Toro]] is announced as the director of ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit]]'' film adaptation and it's proposed sequel.
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - The thirteenth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Doom of the Last-King", is released in North America.
* '''[[28 April|28]]''' - ''[[Tolkien - min vän Ronald och hans världar]]'' is published.

==May==
* '''[[1 May|1]]''' - ''[[Of Words and Worlds]]'' is published.
* '''[[1 May|1]]''' - The thirteenth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Doom of the Last-King", is released in Europe.
*'''[[10 May|10]]''' - [[Frank Frazetta]], who created illustrations for [[The Hobbit]] and [[The Lord of the Rings]] dies.
* '''[[23 May|23]]''' - The [[RiffTrax]] commentary of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' is released online.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 211]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Lembas Extra: Proceedings of the 5th Unquendor Lustrum]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[5 June|5]]-[[8 June|8]]''' - [[Forodrim]]'s 36th birthday celebration.
* '''[[10 June|10]]''' - Actor [[David Brierly]] dies.
==July==
* '''[[1 July|1]]''' - ''[[Tolkien On Fairy-stories]]'' is published.
* '''[[10 July|10]]-[[13 July|13]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing|Tolkien Thing X]].
* '''[[22 July|22]]''' - The fourteenth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "The Ring-forges of Eregion", is released in North America.
* '''[[24 July|24]]''' - The fourteenth book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "The Ring-forges of Eregion", is released in Europe.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 5]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 212]]'' is published.
==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[Pauline Baynes]], Tolkien's favourite artist, dies.
* '''[[15 August|15]]-[[18 August|18]]''' - [[Mythcon 39]].

==September==
* '''[[8 September|8]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Oxford]]'' is published. 
* '''[[25 September|25]]-[[28 September|28]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2008]].
* '''?''' - The 2008 edition of ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 213]]'' is published.
==October==
* '''[[7 October|7]]''' - The [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|radio series of ''Tales from the Perilous Realm'']] is re-released in the US.
* '''[[21 October|21]]''' - Fantasy novel ''[[The Indigo King]]'', featuring [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] as a fictional character, is published.
* '''[[23 October|23]]''' - ''[[The Spoken Word: British Writers]]'', featuring an interview with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is released.
==November==
* '''[[1 November|1]]''' - ''[[The Tolkien Name in History]]'' is published.
* '''[[12 November|12]]''' - ''[[Fantasy, Myth and the Measure of Truth|Fantasy, Myth and the Measure of Truth: Tales of Pullman, Lewis, Tolkien, MacDonald and Hoffmann]]'' is published.
* '''[[18 November|18]]''' - The fifteenth and final book of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Daughter of Strife", is released.
* '''[[18 November|18]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]]'' is released.
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - ''[[Tolkien, Race and Cultural History|Tolkien, Race and Cultural History: From Fairies to Hobbits]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 214]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[29 December|29]]''' - Artist [[Kay Woollard]] dies.

==?==
* '''? (Autumn)''' - [[Mallorn 46|''Mallorn'' 46]] is published.
